name: Flappy JoJo
description:
Pet Shop from Part 3 of JoJo' s Bizzare Adventure   flies in the sky. oh no! KIler Queen and Dio Brando are throwing object on him, help Pet Shop to dodge these object with mouse click and use his stand skill, also you can help Pet Shop taking buff in game!!

A game inspired to JoJo's Bizzare Adventure 

Credits: 

Developer: Cristian Anglani ig@_.shooko.__

Game Designer: Anthony Habashy ig @0reinydevil0

Music and Sound: MixKit.co
